name: FlappyAttack
description:
FlappyAttack, is your new favorite game, its challenging and fun, press with 2 fingers or thumbs at the same time to use your heavy equipment.

Update: press with both thumbs when the score screen appears to save a screenshot in your images folder, the first time it may not show up in the gallery if so restart your phone after that it will show up every time. the gallery icon may not immediately update but when selected or posted it will show the correct latest screenshot
